name: Gravity Hook (milicen)
description:
Your goal is to travel through each circles to the farthest point.

You start off orbiting a circle, you can then jump and attach hook to other circles to land on them.

How to play :

Web :

When on circle    :    click "left-mouse button" to jump from circle

When on air         :   click "left-mouse button" when the red sensor collides with other circle to hook yourself to it

Android :

When on circle    :    tap anywhere on the screen to jump from circle

When on air         :   tap anywhere on the screen when the red sensor collides with other circle to hook yourself to it

N.B

If you feel the game is laggy in the browser, consider downloading either the Android version or Windows version.
